phases.description: Build maximal finger strength (crimps), explosive power, and bouldering ability to address weaknesses. Maintain endurance with low-intensity work. Emphasis on high-intensity bouldering, max hangs, and campus board for power, with technical focus on small holds and slopers.

weekly_schedule.focus: Max Boulder Sessions + Fingerboard Max Hangs (Crimps)
weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Stretching. Max Boulder Sessions: 60 min, 4-6 problems at or above V6, 3-5 min rest between attempts, focus on small crimps and slopers. Fingerboard Max Hangs (Crimps): 30 min, 5 sets of 10s hangs on 18-20mm edge, 3-4 min rest, half crimp grip. Cool-down: 10 min Light Stretching.

exercises.name: Max Boulder Sessions
exercises.details: : 60 min, 4-6 problems at or above V6, 3-5 min rest between attempts, focus on small crimps and slopers.

weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Movement Practice. Campus Board Exercises: 45 min, 6-8 sets of laddering/touches, 2-3 min rest, focus on half crimp and open hand. Volume Bouldering: 45 min, 10-12 moderate problems (V3-V5), focus on movement efficiency. Cool-down: 10 min Flexibility and Mobility Circuit.

exercises.name: Campus Board Exercises
exercises.details: : 45 min, 6-8 sets of laddering/touches, 2-3 min rest, focus on half crimp and open hand. Volume

exercises.name: Volume Bouldering
exercises.details: : 45 min, 10-12 moderate problems (V3-V5), focus on movement efficiency. Cool-down: 10 min Flexibility and Mobility Circuit.

weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Hip Mobility. Boulder Pyramids: 60 min, build up to max boulder (V6), then back down, 2-3 min rest between problems. Density Hangs: 20 min, 5 sets of 30s hangs on 20-22mm edge, 2 min rest. Cool-down: 10 min Light Stretching.

weekly_schedule.focus: Fingerboard Max Hangs (Crimps) + Silent Feet Drills
weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Stretching. Fingerboard Max Hangs (Crimps): 30 min, 5 sets of 10s hangs on 18mm edge, 3-4 min rest, focus on half crimp. Silent Feet Drills: 30 min on bouldering wall, focus on precise footwork on small holds. Cool-down: 10 min Cool-down Exercises.

phases.description: Convert new strength and power into power-endurance and route-specific intensity. Focus on linking hard moves, simulating the V8 crux, and maintaining finger strength. Sessions include boulder intervals, campus, and anaerobic capacity work, with continued technical practice.

weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Stretching. Boulder Intervals: 45 min, 4 sets of 4 boulders (V4-V6), 1 min on/2 min off, focus on linking crux-style moves. Fingerboard Max Hangs (Crimps): 30 min, 4 sets of 10s hangs on 16-18mm edge, 3 min rest. Cool-down: 10 min Light Stretching.

weekly_schedule.focus: Campus Board Exercises + Intensive Foot-On Campus
weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Movement Practice. Campus Board Exercises: 45 min, 6-8 sets of laddering/touches, 2-3 min rest, focus on contact strength. Intensive Foot-On Campus: 20 min, 6 sets of 10 moves, 2 min rest, focus on speed and precision. Cool-down: 10 min Flexibility and Mobility Circuit.

exercises.name: Campus Board Exercises
exercises.details: : 45 min, 6-8 sets of laddering/touches, 2-3 min rest, focus on contact strength. Intensive Foot-On

exercises.name: Intensive Foot-On Campus
exercises.details: : 20 min, 6 sets of 10 moves, 2 min rest, focus on speed and precision. Cool-down: 10 min Flexibility and Mobility Circuit.

weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Hip Mobility. Max Intensity Redpoints: 60 min, 3-4 attempts at hardest boulder/lead circuits simulating route crux, 5-8 min rest. Density Hangs: 20 min, 4 sets of 30s hangs on 18-20mm edge, 2 min rest. Cool-down: 10 min Light Stretching.

Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Stretching. Boulder Intervals: 45 min, 4 sets of 3 boulders (V4-V5), 1 min on/2 min off, focus on slopers and technical movement. Silent Feet Drills: 30 min, focus on precise footwork under fatigue. Cool-down: 10 min Cool-down Exercises.

exercises.name: Silent Feet Drills
exercises.details: : 30 min, focus on precise footwork under fatigue. Cool-down: 10 min Cool-down Exercises.

phases.description: Sharpen for performance. Reduce volume by ~50%, maintain intensity. Focus on quality, low fatigue, and route simulation. Prioritize rest and recovery for peak send attempts.

weekly_schedule.details: Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Stretching. Max Boulder Sessions: 45 min, 3-4 problems at V6, 4-5 min rest, focus on crux-style moves. Cool-down: 10 min Light Stretching.
Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Stretching. Fingerboard Max Hangs (Crimps): 20 min, 3 sets of 10s hangs on 18mm edge, 3 min rest. Cool-down: 10 min Flexibility and Mobility Circuit.

Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up, 5 min Dynamic Stretching. Boulder Intervals: 30 min, 2 sets of 3 boulders (V4-V5), 1 min on/2 min off, focus on route-style movement. Cool-down: 10 min Light Stretching.
Warm-up: 10 min General Warm-up. Silent Feet Drills: 20 min, focus on precise footwork and confidence on small holds. Light Stretching: 10 min. Emphasize rest and recovery for send attempt.

exercises.name: Silent Feet Drills
exercises.details: : 20 min, focus on precise footwork and confidence on small holds. Light Stretching: 10 min. Emphasize rest and recovery for send attempt.

exercises.name: Light Stretching
exercises.details: : 10 min. Emphasize rest and recovery for send attempt.
